Q3 2024 Revenue Report

Executive Summary:
Our Q3 revenue increased by 15.8% to $2.4M, driven by strong performance in cloud services. Amazon Web Services (AWS) contributed significantly to this growth.

Key Metrics:
- Total Revenue: $2.4M (up 15.8%)
- Cloud Services: $1.2M (up 23.4%)
- Customer Acquisition Cost: $150 per customer
- Customer Lifetime Value: $3,200

Regional Performance:
- North America: 45% of total revenue
- Europe: 30% of total revenue  
- Asia-Pacific: 25% of total revenue

CEO John Smith commented: "This quarter demonstrates our strong market position and the effectiveness of our digital transformation strategy."

Contact: investors@company.com
Board Meeting: October 15, 2024
